article_text:
If you’re a Democrat, you can take heart from a report in today’s New York Times. Hillary Clinton's 2008 campaign underestimated Barack Obama, and the inevitable Democratic presidential nominee ended up losing. This year her campaign managed to underestimate Bernie Sanders. It looks as though she’ll be spared a repeat of 2008, but only because Sanders is so hard to underestimate.

According to the Times, however, Mrs. Clinton’s campaign—in contrast, until recently, to the Republicans—is taking Donald Trump seriously. Or at...

article_summary:
Hillary Clinton's 2008 campaign underestimated Barack Obama, and the inevitable Democratic presidential nominee ended up losing.
If you’re a Democrat, you can take heart from a report in today’s New York Times.
According to the Times, however, Mrs. Clinton’s campaign—in contrast, until recently, to the Republicans—is taking Donald Trump seriously.
It looks as though she’ll be spared a repeat of 2008, but only because Sanders is so hard to underestimate.
This year her campaign managed to underestimate Bernie Sanders.
